培培爸《小学数学思维课》<br>
<img id="aimg_FUO0h" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/hrline/1.gif" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/hrline/1.gif"><br>
<br>
<br>
主要内容：课程强调通过逻辑推理、数形结合等思维训练提升数学能力，采用游戏化教学方式，将抽象数学概念融入生活场景，激发孩子主动探索欲&amp;#8204;。<br>
<img id="aimg_iItl4" onclick="zoom(this, this.src, 0, 0, 0)" class="zoom" file="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/hrline/1.gif" onmouseover="img_onmouseoverfunc(this)" lazyloadthumb="1" border="0" alt="" src="https://static.52pojie.cn/static/image/hrline/1.gif"><br>
<br>
